title: artifacts not shown in UI

labels.name: needs author feedback
labels.description: Issue is waiting for the author to respond

body:
Hi, after hours searching online I couldn't find a solution when storing artifacts locally. Strangely, my test file is located within the run's artifacts directory, but it's not shown on the mlflow UI. Tried `mlflow ui --backend-store-uri models/mlruns --default-artifact-root models/mlruns` unsuccessfully. YAML file points to the right folder. 

```python
with open('test.file', 'wb') as f:
    joblib.dump(test, f)

mlflow.set_tracking_uri('../models/mlruns')
with mlflow.start_run():
    mlflow.log_artifact('test.file')
    print(mlflow.get_artifact_uri())
mlflow.end_run()

# ./models/mlruns/0/838f9f54c9f24f13bc299bac6068b8db/artifacts
```


```batch
❯ tree models/mlruns/0/838f9f54c9f24f13bc299bac6068b8db
models/mlruns/0/838f9f54c9f24f13bc299bac6068b8db
├── artifacts
│   └── test.file
├── meta.yaml
├── metrics
├── params
└── tags
    ├── mlflow.source.name
    ├── mlflow.source.type
    └── mlflow.user

4 directories, 5 files

❯ cat models/mlruns/0/838f9f54c9f24f13bc299bac6068b8db/meta.yaml
artifact_uri: ../models/mlruns/0/838f9f54c9f24f13bc299bac6068b8db/artifacts
end_time: 1593590656375
entry_point_name: ''
experiment_id: '0'
lifecycle_stage: active
name: ''
run_id: 838f9f54c9f24f13bc299bac6068b8db
```

# System information
**Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**: -
**OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: macOS 10.15
**MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: pip
**MLflow version (run mlflow --version)**: mlflow, version 1.9.1
**Python version**: 3.7.4
**npm version (if running the dev UI)**: -
**Exact command to reproduce**: `mlflow ui --backend-store-uri models/mlruns --default-artifact-root models/mlruns`

_Originally posted by @ciberger in https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/issues/884#issuecomment-652266853_
